times table.translation[0].definitions[0: a list that young children learn, in which all the numbers between 1 and 12 are multiplied by each other
He’s 12 years old and still doesn’t know his three times table.
times table.translation[1].definitions[0: a list, used especially by children in school, that shows the results when each number between one and twelve is multiplied by each number between one and twelve
Do you know the eleven times table?
